title: Bug 125678: Original chart instance not updated after running report
OB: When the report is executed, the original chart instance obtained during design time remains unmodified. The chart does not reflect the data bound to it after running the report.
EB: I expect that the chart instance, obtained during design time, should be updated and reflect the data after running the report. This behavior was functioning correctly until BIRT 2.0M3, where the chart was appropriately updated with data after report execution.
SR:
1. Obtain the design time instance of the chart in the application.
2. Call the method to run the report.
3. Verify that the chart is bound with the data after executing the report.
